lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "Energy futures trading is going through a tremendous period of transition that will last five to 10 years," Marks said, adding that volume will soar, international participation will increase, and activity of producing countries, major oil companies, and speculators will grow.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Trading in energy futures on the New York Mercantile Exchange will change dramatically over the next five to 10 years as the market matures, according to outgoing chairman Michel Marks.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Marks steps down as chairman after an nine-year tenure when board elections are held March 17.

lst.name: sentence
